title: nIlOtpalAmbA
sahitya:
nIlOtpalAmbA jayati nitya shuddha shubhadAyikA shrI


anupallavi

 mUlA jnAna hara guruguha jananI phAlalOcanI purANI pannaga vENI natavANI


caraNam   shivakAmEshvarI shankarI shrngAra rasakarI pAshAnkusha dharI parama dayAkari bhavarOga hara 
nipuNatara varadAyinyAm nArAyaNagauLa rAga mOdinyAm bhukti mukti maccittam vilayatu
